title: HSPTaskRequestPayload_v0.1
description: Schema for HSP Task Request Payload version 0.1. An AI requests another AI to perform a task.

request_id.description: Unique ID for this task request.

requester_ai_id.description: DID or URI of the AI making the request.

target_ai_id.description: Optional specific DID or URI of the target AI.

capability_id_filter.description: ID of the specific capability being requested.

capability_name_filter.description: Name of the capability being requested (alternative to id_filter).

parameters.description: Input parameters for the capability, conforming to its input schema.

requested_output_data_format.description: Requester can hint preferred output data format.

deadline_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp by which the task should ideally be completed.

callback_address.description: URI/topic where the TaskResult should be sent by the executing AI.
